content: get 10 paper clamps write your temperature range on paper then pull c2c weather your yarn through the rounded end for blanket each color my color range in fahrenheit you will also need below 19 white supplies a bag a bin or a 20-31 dark blue tote to store your 32-38 medium blue worsted weight yarn in 10 39-45 teal blanket and yarn gradient colors of your 46-53 green choice start with at least 2 in this is a year 54-60 yellow balls each or make sure it is long crochet 61-68 pale orange common and easily available projet 69-76 bright orange i used all red heart super 77-83 pink saver available at a store close 84-90 red to me in case i ran out of one 91-99 burgundy due to the weather 100+ black the blanket will be an use your second favorite hook i 80x 100 used a h size rectangle hook for a sturdy blanket finish buying yarn when picking your colors buy at least two balls of each except for the hottest and coldest color you only need one of those 10 colors is a nice variety and adjust the temperature range for each color based off your location when changing colors simply start the new tile with the math the math isn t the new color but 80 x 100 square perfect but the weave in your ends daily you will not c2c blanket c2c is very want to go back meaning 80 across the forgiving i used a and do that 365 times at the end bottom and 100 up the double_crochet side would be 22 tiles a and the blanket is day except 22x365 is easily a queen there are 8 030 so the first two sized blanket many great weeks and the last two youtube weeks of the year is only videos that 21 tiles per day teach the c2c technigue c2c weather blanket january september may june febuary october july november march august april december
